general_settings.title: General & Account
general_settings.account_info_desc: View your account details and status.
general_settings.account_type_local: Local Account (all data is stored locally)
general_settings.appearance_language_desc: Personalize the application's appearance and display language.
general_settings.language_desc: You may need to refresh the page to apply the language change.
general_settings.startup_behavior_desc: Configure the default actions when the application starts.
general_settings.show_welcome_desc: Show the welcome and guide page every time you open the application.
general_settings.remember_position_desc: Automatically open and scroll to the last document and position you were reading.

dictionary_settings.title: Dictionary Settings
dictionary_settings.service_config_desc: Select and configure your preferred dictionary API service.
dictionary_settings.test_fail_no_results: Dictionary returned empty results, please check configuration
dictionary_settings.lookup_behavior_desc: Configure how dictionary definitions are triggered and displayed during reading.
dictionary_settings.auto_lookup_desc: Automatically display dictionary definition when clicking on a word
dictionary_settings.show_phonetics_desc: Display international phonetics in dictionary definitions
dictionary_settings.show_examples_desc: Include usage examples in dictionary definitions

wordbook_settings.title: Wordbook & Review
wordbook_settings.stats_desc: Understand your current word learning progress.
wordbook_settings.review_plan_desc: Set your review method and frequency for optimal memory retention.
wordbook_settings.daily_goal_desc: Set the number of words to learn and review daily.
wordbook_settings.daily_new_words_target_desc: Recommended to learn 5-15 new words daily.
wordbook_settings.learning_behavior_desc: Customize automated behaviors related to the wordbook and review.
wordbook_settings.auto_add_to_wordbook_desc: Automatically add a word to the wordbook when you look it up.
wordbook_settings.show_mastery_hints_desc: Distinguish word mastery levels by color when reading.
wordbook_settings.review_reminders_desc: Send notifications when words are due for review.
wordbook_settings.data_management_desc: Import and export your wordbook data.

review_methods.spaced_desc: Scientific review method based on the forgetting curve
review_methods.sequential_desc: Review words in the order they were added
review_methods.difficulty_desc: Prioritize reviewing words marked as difficult

review_center.no_new_words: No new words to learn today.
review_center.learn_new_words_desc: Quickly browse through {{count}} new words to learn today.
review_center.review_old_words_desc: Use flashcard mode to reinforce {{count}} old words.
